proposal:
Hello Dego Community! 👋

First, let me say, we're pretty impressed with the way you are revolutionizing the DeFi space. Your NFT + DeFi approach is like a breath of fresh air. It's like you've created a new operating system for the crypto world, and we're all just living in it. 

We at OnOutDemos, have been admiring your project and thought of extending our B2B tools that align with your vision. We're not here to sell you a lottery ticket, but to offer you the power to create your own lottery! 🎰

We offer a range of tools:

1. DEX (UNI FACTORY) - Create your own DEX based on Uniswap V2. It's like having your own DEGO swap! And the best part, it's customizable and commission-free.

2. Lottery - Set up your own blockchain-based lottery. The winning numbers? That's for you to decide.

3. Wallet - Build a multicurrency crypto wallet for your DEGO tokens. 

4. Farming - Create ERC20 Staking & Yield Farming. It's like planting your own DEGO farm and watching it grow.

5. DAO - Set up governance and proposals for your DEGO token. Democracy is the best policy, right?

6. CrossChain - Create an EVM compatible blockchain bridge. Connect your DEGO world with others.

7. IDOFactory - Launchpad solution for IDO pools and token locking. Launch your DEGO tokens into the stratosphere!

Remember, we're not selling you a DEGO ticket to the moon, we're offering you the rocket ship. 🚀

If you're interested, we'd love to chat more. Check us out at https://t.me/onoutdemos

Keep DEGO-ing!
